title: Medical Baseline Allowance Application
description: A customer with a medical condition that requires powered equipment at home is applying for the Medical Baseline program to receive a larger electricity allowance at the lowest rate.

tasks.description: Explain the program's eligibility requirements and the need for a doctor's certification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the program rules and required documentation.

tasks.description: Provide the customer with the official application form for their doctor to complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the correct form to the customer's email address.

tasks.description: Once the completed form is received, update the customer's account to add the medical baseline allocation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the application and applies the new rate structure to the account.
